channel.title: Need help with NPC dialogues!
channel.description:
How do i add NPC dialogues?
Im using HomieScape 317.
And please don't say: "In client.java" because i already know it is in client.java.
What code do i need to add? Where do i need to add it etc.

item.title: Need help with NPC dialogues!
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

You need the frame for NPC dialogues in order to create the chatbox interface, then you need the packet id of the click here to continue button.

Read full topic
